briefTitle: Consequences of Eccentric Cycling on Exercise-related Neuromuscular Responses and Biomarkers in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Consequences of Eccentric Cycling on Exercise-related Neuromuscular Responses and Biomarkers in Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Investigate the physiological responses of the eccentric cycling on the knee extensors muscles by changes of neuromuscular parameters
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Woman who completed (neo)adjuvant chemotherapy since less than 1 year for a breast cancer
* Woman under hormonotherapy, or menopausal woman, or woman in amenorrhea

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant and nursing woman
* psychiatric, musculoskeletal or neurological disorders
* presenting at least one contraindication to the use of the transcranial magnetic stimulation
* presenting at least one contraindication to the realisation of the maximum effort test
